ignoreCommand: bash -c 'if git diff HEAD^ HEAD --quiet -- ":(exclude)*.md" ":(exclude).github/**" ":(exclude)LICENSE" ":(exclude)docs/**" ":(exclude).devcontainer/**" ":(exclude)scripts/**" ":(exclude).gitignore" ":(exclude).env.example"; then echo "Only non-production files changed, skipping build" && exit 0; else echo "Production files changed, proceeding with build" && exit 1; fi'
